title: Witch's Cottage Adventure #23
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Witch's Kitchen
rooms.description: A cluttered kitchen filled with hanging herbs, bubbling cauldrons, and shelves of mysterious jars. The air is thick with the scent of sage and something more sinister. A black cat watches you from atop a wooden cupboard. Moonlight streams through a small window, illuminating dust motes that dance like tiny spirits.

items.name: bubbling cauldron
items.description: A large iron cauldron with green liquid bubbling inside. Something glints at the bottom.

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A small brass key covered in dried potion residue

items.name: tall wooden cupboard
items.description: An old cupboard with carved moon symbols. It has three drawers.

items.name: worn recipe book
items.description: A stained book filled with potion recipes
items.text: Recipe for Moonlight Elixir: Combine 3 drops of moonflower essence, 7 petals of nightshade, and 2 roots of mandrake. Stir clockwise under a full moon. This potion grants the drinker the ability to see through magical barriers.

items.name: ancient spell scroll
items.description: A scroll with glowing runes written in silver ink
items.text: Scroll of Revealing: This cottage belongs to Morgana the Wise. Her faithful companion Shadow guards her secrets. The most powerful grimoire rests in the locked cabinet where all knowledge is kept safe.

items.name: locked spice cabinet
items.description: A small cabinet with a brass lock, labeled 'Rare Ingredients'

items.name: vial of moonflower essence
items.description: A glass vial containing shimmering blue liquid

items.name: witch's personal diary
items.description: A leather-bound journal with a pentagram on the cover
items.text: Dear Diary, Shadow has been acting strange lately, sensing something in the garden. I've hidden my most precious grimoire in the locked cabinet in my laboratory. Only those who truly understand magic may enter. - Morgana

items.name: black cat
items.description: A sleek black cat with glowing yellow eyes. A small tag on its collar reads 'Shadow'.
items.text: The cat's collar tag reads: 'Shadow - Familiar of Morgana the Wise. If found, return to the Enchanted Garden.'

items.name: heavy oak door
items.description: A sturdy door leading to the potion laboratory. Strange symbols glow faintly on its surface.

rooms.name: Potion Laboratory
rooms.description: A spacious room filled with bubbling beakers, smoking flasks, and shelves lined with bottles of every color. A large workbench dominates the center, covered in open books and scattered ingredients. Crystal orbs hang from the ceiling, casting an eerie purple glow. A locked cabinet stands against the far wall, and a door to the garden is visible to the east.

items.name: alchemist's workbench
items.description: A cluttered workbench with various potion-making tools and ingredients

items.name: dried nightshade petals
items.description: A small pouch containing dark purple petals

items.name: towering bookshelf
items.description: Shelves packed with ancient tomes and scrolls

items.name: master potion guide
items.description: A comprehensive guide to advanced potion-making
items.text: Chapter 7: The Art of Transformation. Remember, a true witch always keeps her grimoire in the locked cabinet. The garden beyond holds the final ingredients needed for the most powerful spells. Only Morgana's familiar Shadow knows the secret paths through the enchanted roses.

items.name: hanging crystal orbs
items.description: Glowing orbs that illuminate the laboratory with magical light
items.text: The orbs pulse with energy, and within them you can see swirling images: a black cat named Shadow, a witch named Morgana, and a locked cabinet glowing with power.

items.name: ingredient chest
items.description: A wooden chest with two compartments for storing rare materials

items.name: mandrake root
items.description: A gnarled root that seems to squirm slightly in your hand

items.name: enchanted garden door
items.description: A door covered in living vines and flowers. A brass plaque displays three questions that must be answered to pass.

password_questions.question: What is the witch's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the spell scroll and diary found in the kitchen

password_questions.question: What is the name of her familiar?
password_questions.hint: Look at the black cat's collar tag in the kitchen

password_questions.question: Where does she keep her grimoire?
password_questions.hint: The witch's diary and potion guide mention this location

rooms.name: Enchanted Garden
rooms.description: You step into a magical garden bathed in silvery moonlight. Luminescent flowers bloom in impossible colors, and the air shimmers with enchantment. A stone path winds through beds of glowing herbs and mystical plants. In the center stands an ancient willow tree with a door carved into its trunk. Beyond the tree, a shimmering portal of light offers escape from the witch's domain.

items.name: luminescent moonflowers
items.description: Flowers that glow with an inner light, their petals soft as silk

items.name: ancient willow tree
items.description: A massive tree with a door carved into its trunk. Runes glow softly on the bark.
items.text: The runes read: 'Freedom lies beyond for those who have gathered the knowledge and ingredients of true magic. The portal awaits the worthy.'

items.name: mystical herb garden
items.description: Beds of magical herbs growing in neat rows

items.name: note of liberation
items.description: A note pinned to a garden stake
items.text: To any who find themselves trapped in my cottage: You have done well to reach this garden. The portal beyond will return you to your world. May you carry the wisdom of magic with you always. - Morgana the Wise

items.name: bubbling stone fountain
items.description: A fountain with crystal-clear water that sparkles with magical energy

items.name: shimmering escape portal
items.description: A swirling portal of light and color that leads back to the mortal world

rooms.name: The Forest Path
rooms.description: You emerge from the portal onto a moonlit forest path. The witch's cottage has vanished behind you, leaving only the whisper of wind through the trees. You are free, carrying with you the secrets and mysteries you discovered within those enchanted walls.

items.name: towering oak trees
items.description: Ancient trees that line the path leading away from the magical realm

items.name: full moon
items.description: A bright full moon illuminating your path to safety

rooms.win_message: You have successfully escaped the Witch's Cottage! Through cleverness and determination, you solved Morgana's puzzles and discovered the secrets of her magical domain. The moonflower essence, nightshade petals, and mandrake root you found glow softly in your pocket - souvenirs of your mystical adventure. You walk away a little wiser in the ways of magic. You win!
